pages.text: Carving is an ability that lets gems convert primed ice blocks into carved statues that give off various effects.$(br2)To trigger the ability, give the gem a pickaxe and set out a two block pillar of one of the primed ice variants.
$(l)Gems that are guaranteed to have it$()$(li)Larimar$(br2) $(l)Gems that have a chance to have it$()$(li)N/A
